Translations.Text: O vi kred DI testament test vi kelk game within reach de your man your sag pilgrimage DI TIEL DISTING those VI OBSERV Him their privacy. Those transgress post this incurred painful retribution

O vi kred ne kill any game pilgrimage Anyone kills any game sur purpose his fine est a numer da livestock best est ekvivalent al game best li killed judgment set 2 equitable popol vi. Ili far sure ti offerings reach Ka bah. Otherwise li expiate feeding poor popol ekvivalent fast atone his offense DI PARDON offenses Se anyone returns al such offense DI testament vengx gxi! DI est Almighty Avenger
All fisx mar est far lawful vi mangx! Dum pilgrimage this maj proviz por vi dum your journey Vi ne cxas pilgrimage Vi reverence DI whom vi summoned
(DI appointed Ka bah SANKT Masjid est sanctuary POPOL ANKAUX SANKT MONAT offerings SANKT Masjid) garlands MARK them! Vi kon ke DI kon cxio en heavens ter kaj ti DI est Omniscient
Kon ti DI est strict en enforcing retribution DI Forgiving Merciful
Pland duty messenger est liver message DI kon cxio vi deklar cxio vi conceal
Proklam mav bon est ne sam eben se abundance mav maj impon vi! Vi reverence DI (eben vi est minority O vi posed intelligence ke vi sukces)
